params.welcome_message:
Hello.

I'm Matt Langford, Pastor at Landmark Church in Lafayette, Louisiana, and a freelance web designer/blogger.

My recent work includes starting a blog for church leaders, [Desk of Matt](https://deskofmatt.com/), and designing theme for the Micro.blog platform (including the default Sumo).

You might be interested in reading my [latest posts](https://mattlangford.com/posts/). I'm also on [Mastodon](https://micro.blog/mtt), [Instagram](https://instagram.com/mattlangford), [X](https://x.com/mattlangford), and [Micro.blog](https://micro.blog/mtt). *Matt*
